architectureDecisions.title: Architecture Decisions

architecture.title: 4. Architecture Overview
architecture.description: The application follows a microservices architecture with three main backend services:
architecture.usersService: Users Service (Java/Spring Boot): User management and authentication
architecture.ticketsService: Tickets Service (C#/.NET 8): Ticket and issue tracking system
architecture.aiGateway: AI Gateway (Node.js/Express): AI-powered features using Ollama
architecture.webFrontend: Web Frontend (Next.js): Modern React-based user interface

learnMore.title: Learn More
learnMore.description: For detailed migration guides and architecture decisions, refer to the documentation files in the /docs directory of the repository.
